import React, { useState } from 'react'; const SalesCollateral = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [showUploadModal, setShowUploadModal] = useState(false); const [selectedItems, setSelectedItems] = useState([]); const collateral = [ { id: 1, name: 'Product Overview Deck', type: 'sales_deck', format: 'PPTX', size: '12.5 MB', uploaded: '2024-01-15', lastModified: '2024-01-20', downloads: 45 }, { id: 2, name: 'Company One Pager', type: 'one_pager', format: 'PDF', size: '2.1 MB', uploaded: '2024-01-10', lastModified: '2024-01-10', downloads: 23 }, { id: 3, name: 'Pricing Sheet Q1 2024', type: 'pricing', format: 'PDF', size: '1.8 MB', uploaded: '2024-01-05', lastModified: '2024-01-15', downloads: 67 }, { id: 4, name: 'Case Study - TechCorp', type: 'case_study', format: 'PDF', size: '5.2 MB', uploaded: '2024-01-08', lastModified: '2024-01-12', downloads: 34 }, { id: 5, name: 'Feature Comparison Matrix', type: 'comparison', format: 'XLSX', size: '890 KB', uploaded: '2024-01-12', lastModified: '2024-01-18', downloads: 28 }, { id: 6, name: 'ROI Calculator', type: 'calculator', format: 'XLSX', size: '1.1 MB', uploaded: '2024-01-03', lastModified: '2024-01-03', downloads: 89 } ]; const collateralTypes = { sales_deck: { label: 'Sales Deck', color: 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800' }, one_pager: { label: 'One Pager', color: 'bg-green-100 text-green-800' }, pricing: { label: 'Pricing', color: 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-800' }, case_study: { label: 'Case Study', color: 'bg-orange-100 text-orange-800' }, comparison: { label: 'Comparison', color: 'bg-red-100 text-red-800' }, calculator: { label: 'Calculator', color: 'bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-800' } }; const filteredCollateral = collateral.filter(item => item.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const handleSelectAll = (checked) => { if (checked) { setSelectedItems(filteredCollateral.map(item => item.id)); } else { setSelectedItems([]); } }; const handleSelectItem = (itemId, checked) => { if (checked) { setSelectedItems([...selectedItems, itemId]); } else { setSelectedItems(selectedItems.filter(id => id !== itemId)); } }; const handleDownload = () => { // Handle download logic for selected items console.log('Downloading items:', selectedItems); }; return (
